item.label: Design Preset
item.description: Apply a pre-made form style. You can still override individual options below.

item.label: Select Form
item.description: Choose a Contact Form 7 form to display.

item.label: Show Form Header
item.description: Enable to show a header above the form.

item.label: Use Icon
item.description: Choose to use an icon instead of an image in the header.

item.label: Header Image
item.description: Upload an image for the header.

item.label: Header Icon
item.description: Select an icon for the header.

item.label: Enable Custom Radio/Checkbox Styles
item.description: Enable custom styling for radio buttons and checkboxes.

item.label: Common Text Fields Height
item.description: Define static height for the common text fields.

item.label: Form Field Padding
item.description: Define custom padding for each field.

item.label: Form Field Spacing Bottom
item.description: Space the form field will take at the bottom.

item.label: Form Label Spacing Bottom
item.description: Space the form label will take at the bottom.

item.label: Message Text Alignment
item.description: Align message text left, right or center.
